name: Escape Mage (2022 Team 14)
description:
The main story: You will play as a sorceress with magical talents who has been imprisoned by an evil warlock in an enchanted castle. You'll wake up in a secret room in a dark, ominous castle in the middle of nowhere when you regain consciousness at the start of the game. The chamber you've been confined in appears to have been abandoned for a long time and is riddled with magical spells, with no apparent way out.

Instruction: use AWSD to move, if turn round uses the cursor to rotate the camera, and click the cursor on the objects to collect items into inventory.

Developers: Vi Huynh & Quang Nguyen

Credits:

- Music: Background music

- Art style:

  1. - Custom paper hints and wall writings from VI HUYNH
  2. - Fantasy Skybox FREE  from RENDER KNIGHT
  3. - Procedural Fire from HOVL STUDIO
  4. - Dark Fantasy Kit [Lite] from RUNEMARK STUDIO
  5. - FREE Witchcraft and Wizardry Asset from FEROCIOUS INDUSTRIES
  6. - Sound effects from B.G.M
  7. - Books from VIS GAME
  8. - ALEKSN09 and 3D.RINA
